subject: Re: [junit] Re: Migrating from NetBeans to cmd line
msgSnippet: John, I ve been led to believe that for junit+ant questions, people tend to find more luck on the ant forums than here, but hopefully someone will pipe up. To
messageBody:
John,

I've been led to believe that for junit+ant questions, people tend to
find more luck on the ant forums than here, but hopefully someone will
pipe up.

To answer one of your questions, there is no ant support directly
built into the main junit jar.

Debugging the build.xml is really hard, because your email seems to
have munged the formatting. Could you maybe post it at
http://gist.github.com?

David Saff
